about_the_game:
The dog I rescued (Chill) was turned into a canine-eared girl one day.
They don't speak very well at first, but as they play and learn, she will gradually learn the language and be able to communicate with you more deeply.

[Caring for her]
Chill loves you because of raising her.
Depending on what you learn together, she'll learn to cook with you or become a slutty dog who loves to get laid.

[Endless cohabitation]
There is a story, but no clear ending.
Enjoy a little magical cohabitation with Chill.

Interactive H-simulation


Touch Chill's body directly and make her feel good. You may be confused before you get used to it, but as you get to know Chill, you'll become more aggressive.

Because it is 3D, you can move the camera freely and enjoy it from any point of view.
You can freely change the clothes you wear.
The protagonist, who at first ran out of strength after just one ejaculation, gradually becomes stronger as he lives with Chill.

Apart from this, there is also a dramatic H scene.

Highly flexible dress-up system


As well as clothing, you can set the color of your hair to the color of your eyes.
There are no limits to the number of combinations!

And, of course, you can make out in any way you like.

If it's well received, it might be more customizable in the update?

Enhanced configuration features

Not only can the background be turned on and off, but it can also be semi-transparent.
You can finely control the display of male characters and male genitalia as well.

The audio volume can be freely adjusted at any time for your comfort.

Just press F11 to take a screenshot on the spot!

In the title screen, you can set the language, screen resolution, camera sensitivity, reverse settings, etc.
It can be adjusted in more detail.

content_descriptors.notes: This game depicts sexual acts between the player and a female character. All characters depicted are over the age of 18.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 10
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: geforce gtx1030
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: I do not recommend intel HD Graphics( If use, please update to latest driver
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Living together with lovely dog-eared girl simulator. One snowy winter day, I picked up a dog shivering in the cold at a shrine. Heartbroken by my family's misfortune, I decided to take good care of this dog at least. and one day it became a dog-eared girl.
supported_languages:
English, Simplified Chinese, Japanese*
*languages with full audio support
